IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MERCERSBURG ACADEMY PREPARES YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN FROM DIVERSE BACKGROUNDS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR LIFE IN A GLOBAL COMMUNITY. STUDENTS AT MERCERSBURG PURSUE A RIGOROUS AND DYNAMIC CURRICULUM WHILE LEARNING TO LIVE TOGETHER HARMONIOUSLY IN A SUPPORTIVE RESIDENTIAL ENVIRONMENT. MERCERSBURG'S TALENTED FACULTY INSTILL IN STUDENTS THE VALUE OF HARD WORK AND THE IMPORTANCE OF CHARACTER AND COMMUNITY AS THEY TEACH STUDENTS TO THINK FOR THEMSELVES, TO APPROACH LIFE THOUGHTFULLY AND CREATIVELY, TO THRIVE PHYSICALLY, TO ACT MORALLY, TO VALUE THE SPIRITUAL DIMENSION OF HUMAN EXISTENCE, AND TO SERVE OTHERS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MERCERSBURG ACADEMY PREPARES YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN FROM DIVERSE BACKGROUNDS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR LIFE IN A GLOBAL COMMUNITY. STUDENTS AT MERCERSBURG PURSUE A RIGOROUS AND DYNAMIC CURRICULUM WHILE LEARNING TO LIVE TOGETHER HARMONIOUSLY IN A SUPPORTIVE RESIDENTIAL ENVIRONMENT. MERCERSBURG'S TALENTED FACULTY INSTILL IN STUDENTS THE VALUE OF HARD WORK AND THE IMPORTANCE OF CHARACTER AND COMMUNITY AS THEY TEACH STUDENTS TO THINK FOR THEMSELVES, TO APPROACH LIFE THOUGHTFULLY AND CREATIVELY, TO THRIVE PHYSICALLY, TO ACT MORALLY, TO VALUE THE SPIRITUAL DIMENSION OF HUMAN EXISTENCE, AND TO SERVE OTHERS.
IRS990.Desc: AN INDEPENDENT COLLEGE-PREPARATORY SCHOOL IN SOUTH-CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA, THE ACADEMY OFFERS A RIGOROUS ACADEMIC PROGRAM TO APPROXIMATELY 430 BOARDING AND DAY STUDENTS IN GRADES 9 THROUGH 12. IN SMALL CLASSES, STUDENTS AND FACULTY WORK EYE TO EYE AND MIND TO MIND, AS THEY DEEPEN THEIR UNDERSTANDING OF THEIR SUBJECTSAND OF THEMSELVES. OUTSIDE THE CLASSROOM, STUDENTS IMMERSE THEMSELVES IN THEATER, SPORTS, MUSIC, COMPETITIONS, AND CAMARADERIE. THEY DEVELOP DEEP FRIENDSHIPS WITH STUDENTS FROM NEXT DOOR AND FROM ACROSS THE WORLD. THEY EXPLORE NEW CONCEPTS AND PUSH PAST THEIR LIMITS. MERCERSBURG IS A PLACE OF TRANSFORMATION. STUDENTS TRANSFORM THEMSELVESAS THEY PREPARE TO TRANSFORM THEIR WORLD.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SUMMER PROGRAMS:DURING THE SUMMER, MERCERSBURG PROVIDES FOR A WIDE RANGE OF OPPORTUNITIES FOR LEARNING, PERSONAL GROWTH, AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, FUN. EACH SUMMER, PARTICIPANTS TAKE PART IN AN ARRAY OF PROGRAMS, RANGING FROM THE ADVENTURE CAMP SERIES TO VARIOUS ENRICHMENT, ARTS, AND SPORTS CAMPS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: H DEAN HOSGOOD III PHD MPH

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MERCERSBURG'S FINE ARTS AND VALUABLE ITEMS COLLECTIONS INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO, PAINTINGS, ETCHINGS, PICTURES, TAPESTRIES, STAINED GLASS WINDOWS, ANTIQUITIES AND OTHER WORKS OF ART (I.E. VALUABLE RUGS, SCULPTURES, BRONZES, ANTIQUE FURNITURE, RARE BOOKS, HISTORICAL LETTERS, ANTIQUE SILVER, MANUSCRIPTS, RARE GLASS) OF RARITY, HISTORICAL VALUE, AND/OR ARTISTIC MERIT. ART NOT ONLY PROVIDES AESTHETIC APPRECIATION AND ENJOYMENT, IT ALSO HAS THE POWER TO STIMULATE CREATIVE THINKING AND DISCUSSION. WE ATTEMPT TO INTEGRATE ART INTO THE LIVES OF PEOPLE, INSPIRING REFLECTION AND GENERATING HISTORICAL AND CULTURAL AWARENESS. SOME PIECES OF MERCERSBURG'S COLLECTION ARE PERMANENTLY ON DISPLAY THROUGHOUT THE SCHOOL, OTHERS ARE PERIODICALLY PLACED ON EXHIBIT TO THE SCHOOL COMMUNITY AND THE PUBLIC.

THE PURPOSE OF THE ENDOWMENT IS TO SUPPORT THE CURRENT OPERATIONS AND ACTIVITIES OF THE ACADEMY THROUGH A TOTAL RETURN INVESTMENT STRATEGY AND A SPENDING POLICY SET TO MAINTAIN, OR IDEALLY INCREASE, THE PURCHASING POWER OF THE ENDOWMENT, WITHOUT PUTTING THE PRINCIPAL VALUE OF THE ENDOWMENT'S INVESTMENTS AT IMPRUDENT RISK.

UNDER PROVISIONS OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, SECTION 501(C)(3), AND THE APPLICABLE INCOME TAX REGULATIONS OF PENNSYLVANIA, MERCERSBURG IS EXEMPT FROM TAXES ON INCOME OTHER THAN UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. SINCE MERCERSBURG HAD NO MATERIAL UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME DURING THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN MADE. THE ACCOUNTING STANDARD ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES ADDRESSES THE DETERMINATION OF WHETHER TAX BENEFITS CLAIMED OR EXPECTED TO BE CLAIMED ON A TAX RETURN SHOULD BE RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. UNDER THIS GUIDANCE, MERCERSBURG MAY RECOGNIZE THE TAX BENEFIT FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. THE TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH A POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50% LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. THE GUIDANCE ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES ALSO ADDRESSES DE-RECOGNITION, CLASSIFICATION, INTEREST AND PENALTIES ON INCOME TAXES AND ACCOUNTING IN INTERIM PERIODS. MERCERSBURG HAD NO SUCH POSITIONS RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AT JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017. GENERALLY, MERCERSBURG IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL INCOME TAX POSITIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2015.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: GENERAL SUPPORT TO ASSIST WITH NEEDS OF THE FIRE COMPANY

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: STUDENT AID FOR REQUIRED FEES, BOOKS AND SUPPLIES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FAMILIES APPLY FOR FINANCIAL AID THROUGH SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICES BY COMPLETING A PARENT FINANCIAL STATEMENT AND SUPPLYING THREE YEARS OF W2S AND 1040S PLUS BUSINESS/FARM STATEMENTS AS APPLICABLE.

THE DISCRETIONARY ACCOUNT IS ONLY ASSOCIATED WITH SCHOOL BUSINESS AND IS NOT FOR PERSONAL EXPENSES. THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS REQUIRED TO LIVE ON CAMPUS. THE HOUSE IS USED REGULARLY FOR SCHOOL FUNCTIONS INCLUDING STUDENT DINNERS, BOARD ENTERTAINMENT, ALUMNI EVENTS AND HOSTING OVERNIGHT TEACHER CANDIDATES AND SPEAKERS. T. DOUGLAS HALE, FORMER HEAD OF SCHOOL, AND KATHERINE TITUS, CURRENT HEAD OF SCHOOL, RECEIVED NON-TAXABLE HOUSING ALLOWANCE IN THE AMOUNT OF $10,000, INCLUDING PART-TIME HOUSEKEEPING SERVICES.
KATHERINE TITUS RECEIVED A PERFORMANCE BONUS IN THE AMOUNT OF $5,000 AND THIS IS REPORTED IN SCHEDULE J, PART II, COLUMN B(II).

LoansBtwnOrgInterestedPrsnGrp.LoanPurposeTxt: MORTGAGE LOAN FOR HOME IN RHODE ISLAND

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL IS AWAITING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION IN ORDER TO TIMELY FILE A COMPLETE AND ACCURATE FORM 990-T BY THE EXTENDED DEADLINE OF MAY 15, 2019. THE AMOUNT SHOWN AS NET UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME ON LINE 7B OF PAGE 1 OF THE FORM 990 IS AN ESTIMATE BASED ON AVAILABLE INFORMATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER AND OFFICER ELECTRONICALLY FOR THEIR INDEPENDENT REVIEW BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS, TRUSTEES, AND ALL EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED ANNUALLY TO PREPARE A "CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY QUESTIONNAIRE" DISCLOSING BUSINESSES, ACTIVITIES, AND/OR RELATIONSHIPS THAT MAY GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS. THESE ARE REVIEWED, AND ADDRESSED AS NECESSARY, BY MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF MERCERSBURG ACADEMY'S BOARD DELIBERATE ON, REVIEW, AND APPROVE THE SALARY OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND THE OTHER TWO TOP EMPLOYEES. THIS GROUP HAS FULL COMPARABILITY DATA AVAILABLE FROM BOTH ABOPS AND NAIS TO AID IN SUCH DELIBERATIONS. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REPORTS ITS FINDINGS TO THE ENTIRE BOARD THAT THEY HAVE REVIEWED AND APPROVED THE COMPENSATION OF THESE INDIVIDUALS. THE HEAD OF SCHOOL UNDERGOES ANOTHER REVIEW BY THE FULL BOARD AT THE MAY MEETINGS. THE COMPLETION OF THAT DELIBERATION, REVIEW, AND APPROVAL PROCESS IS RECORDED IN THE MINUTES OF THE MAY BOARD MEETINGS. THE OFFICERS OF MERCERSBURG ACADEMY'S BOARD DISCUSS, REVIEW, AND APPROVE THE RECOMMENDATION FROM THE HEAD OF SCHOOL CONCERNING THE SALARIES OF THE TOP FOUR HIGHEST PAID EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL, NOT INCLUDING THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. THESE BOARD OFFICERS ALSO HAVE FULL COMPARABILITY DATA AVAILABLE FROM BOTH ABOPS AND NAIS TO AID IN THEIR DELIBERATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST OR AT THE BUSINESS OFFICE, MERCERSBURG ACADEMY.
